item.description:
Hi, Iâ€™m Saransh Jain.

Iâ€™ve been lifting on and off for over 10 years. Like many people, my early years were spent training without much structure. Lifting weights, but without truly understanding why I was doing what I was doing.

That changed when I came across StrongLifts 5Ã—5
(https://stronglifts.com/stronglifts-5x5/).

For the first time, I was introduced to compound lifts and a simple, disciplined approach to training.

  • Lift heavy.
  • Train three days a week.
  • Rest on the others.

It worked â€” and it worked consistently. For raw strength, it remains one of the best and simplest training programs.

item.title: What we do
item.description:
Base is built on a simple idea â€” strength is the foundation of everything you do.

We focus on structured, intelligent strength training that helps you move better, feel stronger, and stay active for the long term.

This is not about quick fixes or shortcuts. Itâ€™s about consistency, good coaching, and sustainable progress.

Who this is for

  • People who want to build real strength
  • Anyone looking to stay active and injury-free
  • Beginners and experienced trainees alike

Our approach

  • Small group sessions
  • Emphasis on form and movement quality
  • Progressive strength training
  • Long-term health over short-term results
